website_summaries.verdict: Great product for removing even super-lasting mascara.
pros: Gentle, no-sting formula, even for contact lens wearers
Clinical study alleges a marked reduction in eyelash loss
cons: A light scent that some found unpleasant

customer_reviews.title: My holy grail
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this make up remover for years, and it’s a wonderful watery consistency so it glides right over the skin without any tug, does not irritate eyes and is very effective on a cotton pad for eye makeup removal. I won’t even try anything else. That’s probably the only item in my entire make up stash that I’ve used consistently over time, it’s that good.
customer_reviews.author: thinkagain

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eye make up remover, bar none
customer_reviews.text: I've used Klorane Soothing Eye Make-up remover for well over a decade and I love it. It removes every brand of mascara, eye liner and shadow I've worn without having to rub my eye lids raw. Waterproof mascara is more difficult, but I don't usually wear it because it's harsh on lashes. I also wear soft contact lenses and I don't have any issues with this gentle, non-irritating formula. There aren't enough words to describe how much I love this product. I'm never without it. There are no substitutes. I won't use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: I'll take Manhattan

customer_reviews.title: I bet the waterproof works much better. . .
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed. It didn't do anything, other than smelling amazing, for removing my makeup. I wear waterproof mascara and my coconut oil worked better at removing it. I would skip this one. I'm returning it to get some money back. It's like floral water - refreshing but does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: ... makeup remover for years now and would be so sad if we could no longer obtain the product
customer_reviews.text: My daughters and I have used this eye makeup remover for years now and would be so sad if we could no longer obtain the product.. It refreshes your eyes in the morning and seems to minimize puffiness as well. We are unable to find it in the stores so we are very grateful to be able to purchase it online and keep using it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: When I was a child growing up in Europe, this product was a mainstay of any household. Now that I am an adult, I am so happy tone able to purchase it in the US. Simply put, this is the best eye makeup remover. It is soothing and never stings my eyes and I wear contact lenses.
customer_reviews.author: M. London

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, especially gentle around the eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I like the Klolrane products very much, and its very gentle, not at all irritating, oily, smells very good too!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Handley

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is not irritating to eyes but does take a bit of scrubbing to get the makeup off
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Horton

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Removes even difficult to remove eye make up without irritation. I have also tried the wipes and this liquid remover is much better. It has a slight oily finish which makes the eye make up come off but without a heavy feeling. I am a contact wearer and I can take off my make up with this stuff and reapply without worry.
customer_reviews.author: M. Majoros

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner has met its match.
customer_reviews.text: Take eyeliner off the first time. Ni scrubbing. No residue
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Doll

customer_reviews.title: This product does not deliver as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not irritating to the eyes when removing make up but it does not remove the make up well at all. It takes repeated applications and even then it doesn't remove all the eye make up. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne S. Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Makeup eye remover
customer_reviews.text: Best ever! Works awesome and does not irritate your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: JKam

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has very sensitive skin, and has had problems with other makeup removers. This one works great for her without causing skin reactions or swelling.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget  Fan

customer_reviews.title: i like this brand but the one that is creamy
customer_reviews.text: is liquid . i like this brand but the one that is creamy.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It's the only eye makeup remover that isn't oily. A great product. Klorane always is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great not greasy takes mascara and eyeliner off with ease.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Klorane make up remover
customer_reviews.text: Klorane make up remover is very efficient at removing makeup. It is quite gentle and inexpensive by comparison to lancome or nuxe brands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing! Non greasy but gets the job done. Smells lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Osman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Much better than Neutrogena oil-free. This lasts FOREVER too! I've already had it for a year, and it's not even near finished.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great Texture
customer_reviews.text: I've tried different eye makeup remover products over the years that feel too greasy, but this is the exception. It is gentle, effective and has a nice subtle fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: JPK

customer_reviews.title: It burns.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff burned my eyes, even at times when I just wiped around my eyes. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa Zavich

customer_reviews.title: disapointing
customer_reviews.text: i was hoping for a natural product to remove my eye makeup. This product felt a little harsh and required a lot of rubbing to get my makeup off. didn't really agree with my contacts, either. I'll stick with using Nutrogena Foaming Face Wash (it removes makeup like a dream) to remove my eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Biscuit MomTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Completely effective
customer_reviews.text: So glad to find my one and only eye make-up remover here! I've been using it for decades to remove my eyeliner, and I would despair were it no longer available. It's as gentle as using water, yet completely effective. I just dip a Q-tip into it and wipe. A 3.38 oz. bottle lasts more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: I like it that it's paraben-free and hypoallergenic
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle for the eyes. Remove most of eye makeups but bit of difficult to remove the heavy dark eyeliner or water proof mascara. It has a light pleasant faint scent. I like it that it's paraben-free and hypoallergenic. I'll buy again. On the side note, it says on the bottle as "eye make-up remover lotion". It is not lotion, it is in liquid form. I bought lotion form type of eye makeup remover before and didn't like it at all.
customer_reviews.author: iReview

product_meta.title: Klorane Soothing Eye Make-up Remover, 3.38oz
product_meta.description:
This very gentle eye make-up remover delicately and thoroughly removes all traces of eye make-up. It is free of parabens, alcohol and silicones - making it ideal for the most sensitive eyes. Formulated with cornflower water, a unique active ingredient with soothing and decongesting properties, it gently removes eye make-up from the very fragile eye contour. Suitable for contact lens wearers. Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.

BRAND STORY
By Klorane
